dimensions.notes: 12 = diameter in mm, 20 = height in tenths of mm

shelf_life.notes: Retains 90% capacity after 10 years at room temperature

current_capability.notes: Very low current capability due to small size

safety_notes: Extreme choking hazard due to small size
Keep away from children and pets

handling_considerations.size_precautions: Easily lost due to tiny size
handling_considerations.installation: Use tweezers or small tools for handling
handling_considerations.polarity: Ensure correct orientation - damage risk if reversed

notes: One of the thinnest coin cell batteries available, designed for applications where space is extremely limited. The small size severely limits capacity and current capability, making it suitable only for ultra-low power applications like watch circuits and memory backup.
